plot: The first season is mainly set inside Dubois' dark blue taxi, a Ford Crown Victoria, and the comedy unfolds through his interactions with the guest stars and other passengers who ride in his cab. Season two expanded the show's narrative to focus more on stories and characters outside of his taxi.   Written by  Filmnoir

title: Taxi 0-22
